General.Name: ZUM Internet Corp.
General.Description: ZUM Internet Corp. provides Internet and mobile services in South Korea. It operates Zum.com, a searching portal, which provides pleasure and information content, news, fun, hub, TV, and online shopping services; egloos.com, a blogging platform for games, animations, and cartoons; and Swing Browser, a browser service. The company also offers NEWSUM, a custom news recommendation app; and Lalla, a video fashion review app. ZUM Internet Corp. was founded in 2009 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
